meanings.definition: A salt or ester of cyanic acid.
meanings.sent1: I added a cyanate to the solution to see if it would change color.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of different cyanates in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The cyanate walked into the bar, but the bartender couldn't understand its order.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like a cyanate, quietly influencing everything around her.
meanings.sent5: The cyanate sparkled under the microscope, revealing its intricate structure.

meanings.sent1: The students learned about the structure of a cyanate in their chemistry class.
meanings.sent2: The cyanate in the reaction mixture reacted with the other compounds.
meanings.sent3: The cyanate group in the molecule was the life of the party, always bonding with others.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a cyanate, connecting ideas in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The cyanate group stood out in the chemical formula, defining the compound's behavior.
